short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly generate chat messages with embedded emoji! 💖😆

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the extension that allows you to edit chat messages in a text field that can use emoji shortcuts like Slack. 👀💨

The keyboard shortcuts for Teemo are listed below. 🙌
=============================
Ctrl +Shift + O:
Toggle open or close the text editor. ✍️
-------------------------------------
[While the text editor is open ☝️]
Ctrl + R:
Clear the text area. 🆕

Ctrl + E:
Toggle open or close the emoji picker . 🎨

Ctrl + C:
Copy the text you are typing. 📋
=============================

When I chat on social networking sites, I have a hard time typing emoji because there are no shortcuts available! 😩⌨️
However, I can't stop using emoji because they can be used effectively to convey the correct meaning of a sentence or to abbreviate a sentence.. 👉📝

Therefore, I have developed Teemo, a simple text editor to solve the above problems! 💖😆

I created it for my personal use, but when I introduced it to my friends, it was so well received that I decided to make it public! 🚀🌕

The source code is available at MIT on the GitHub repository. 🌎

If you have any questions or requests, please feel free to create an Issue or Pull Request for you! 🙌

Japanese: https://nikaera.com/archives/teemo-first-release/
ProductHunt: https://www.producthunt.com/posts/teemo-2
GitHub Repository: https://github.com/nikaera/Teemo
